mc.name: Degavolver
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {1}{B} and/or {R}
If the {1}{B} kicker cost was paid, Degavolver comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it and with "Pay 3 life: Regenerate Degavolver."
If the {R} kicker cost was paid, Degavolver comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it and with first strike.

mc.name: Cetavolver
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {1}{R} and/or {G}
If the {1}{R} kicker cost was paid, Cetavolver comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it and with first strike.
If the {G} kicker cost was paid, Cetavolver comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it and with trample.

mc.name: Necravolver
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {1}{G} and/or {W}
If the {1}{G} kicker cost was paid, Necravolver comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it and with trample.
If the {W} kicker cost was paid, Necravolver comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it and with lifelink. (Whenever this creature deals damage, you gain that much life.)

mc.name: Rakavolver
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {1}{W} and/or {U}
If the {1}{W} kicker cost was paid, Rakavolver comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it and with lifelink. (Whenever this creature deals damage, you gain that much life.)
If the {U} kicker cost was paid, Rakavolver comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it and with flying.

mc.name: Anavolver
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {1}{U} and/or {B}
If the {1}{U} kicker cost was paid, Anavolver comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it and with flying.
If the {B} kicker cost was paid, Anavolver comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it and with "Pay 3 life: Regenerate Anavolver."
